Title: Into the Darkness of Khazad-dûm
Text:
The Watchers lie far to the west of Stoneyford, at the base of the Misty Mountains. Manwyn suggested you look for a dwarf encampment within Khazad-dûm.

Manwyn bade you pass through the Watchers, for you no longer have cause to fear the deadly stones. He hopes that you may find a remnant of the force Cromhes led through the stones somewhere on the other side.
CompleteText: Who are you? If you are not a servant of Angmar, how then did you pass through the Watchers and not perish?
